  • public class BellmanFordSP
extends java.lang.Object
    Compilation: javac BellmanFordSP.java Execution: java BellmanFordSP filename.txt s Dependencies: EdgeWeightedDigraph.java DirectedEdge.java Queue.java EdgeWeightedDirectedCycle.java Data files: http://algs4.cs.princeton.edu/44sp/tinyEWDn.txt http://algs4.cs.princeton.edu/44sp/mediumEWDnc.txt Bellman-Ford shortest path algorithm. Computes the shortest path tree in edge-weighted digraph G from vertex s, or finds a negative cost cycle reachable from s. % java BellmanFordSP tinyEWDn.txt 0 0 to 0 ( 0.00) 0 to 1 ( 0.93) 0->2 0.26 2->7 0.34 7->3 0.39 3->6 0.52 6->4 -1.25 4->5 0.35 5->1 0.32 0 to 2 ( 0.26) 0->2 0.26 0 to 3 ( 0.99) 0->2 0.26 2->7 0.34 7->3 0.39 0 to 4 ( 0.26) 0->2 0.26 2->7 0.34 7->3 0.39 3->6 0.52 6->4 -1.25 0 to 5 ( 0.61) 0->2 0.26 2->7 0.34 7->3 0.39 3->6 0.52 6->4 -1.25 4->5 0.35 0 to 6 ( 1.51) 0->2 0.26 2->7 0.34 7->3 0.39 3->6 0.52 0 to 7 ( 0.60) 0->2 0.26 2->7 0.34 % java BellmanFordSP tinyEWDnc.txt 0 4->5 0.35 5->4 -0.66
